summary: This is an email from Camille Garcia to Scott Stackman and Lyle Casriel, with several others copied, providing a recap of the transfer of banking and investment accounts from UBS to JPMorgan for Ghislaine Maxwell and related entities as of December 31, 2013. It details significant financial assets under Maxwell's control and those of her associated organizations.

events.title: Financial Snapshot of Maxwell Accounts
events.description: Market values are provided for Ghislaine Maxwell's banking and investment accounts as of this date, prior to transfer to JPMorgan.

events.title: Email with Financial Transfer Recap
events.description: Camille Garcia sends an email to Scott Stackman and Lyle Casriel detailing the status of transferring Ghislaine Maxwell's financial assets from UBS to JPMorgan.

keyFacts: As of December 31, 2013, Ghislaine Maxwell controlled total assets valued at approximately $14.69 million, split between banking assets (~$3.51 million) and investment assets (~$11.37 million).

The financial recap details accounts for Maxwell personally, the 'Max Foundation', and several LLCs including '116 East 65th Street LLC', 'Pot and Kettle LLC', 'Ellmax LLC', 'TerraMar Project, Inc.', and 'Max Hotel Services Corp.'.
The document evidences an active process of consolidating or moving Maxwell's substantial financial holdings from UBS to JPMorgan Chase in early 2014.
The email was forwarded in August 2020 to individuals including Andrew Fleming, who is noted with '(G-INV)', suggesting government investigative interest in these financial transactions years later.
